data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gil-Santana, Hélcio R. (2012): Rhyparoclopius aokiae sp. nov., a remarkable Stenopodainae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Reduviidae) from Mato Grosso do Sul, Brazil, with taxonomical notes on other species of Rhyparoclopius Stål. Zootaxa 3478: 93-104, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.215347
